headline: 2025-10-27 — ArXiv paper authors introduced an interaction variable defined as instantaneous power (unit: watts, W) to characterize component interactions in electric energy systems.
2025-10-28 — The same ArXiv authors illustrated their approach using 1 RLC circuit with 1 controllable voltage source (count = 1 circuit, 1 source).
2025-10-29 — The paper specifies 2 implemented control approaches (Feedback Linearizing Control (FBLC) and Sliding Mode Control (SMC)) as options to implement the reactive-power command.
2025-10-30 — Authors of the correction note issued a correction addressing 1 'pretty serious mistake' in Olfati‑Saber, Fax & Murray (2007) (count = 1 corrected serious mistake).
